title-group.article-title: Discontinuous Galerkin Methods for Ordinary Differential Equations

abstract.p: A class of Galerkin methods derived from discontinuous piecewise polynomial spaces is analyzed. For polynomials of degree $k$, these methods lead to a family of one-step schemes generating approximations up to order $2k + 2$ for the solution of an ordinary differential equation.
